title: Teen in critical condition following accidental shooting
content:
MEMPHIS, TN (WMC) -
A teen is in critical condition after an accidental shooting on Dupre Street.
Police were called to the scene just before 8 p.m. Sunday and found a 16-year-old boy with a gunshot wound.
Police said the boy and two other young men were playing with a handgun when it went off and struck the victim.
The teen was taken to the hospital in critical condition.
